com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.phase08preparepackage

Class DexMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.AbstractAndroidMojo
        • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.phase08preparepackage.DexMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="dex",
      defaultPhase=PREPARE_PACKAGE,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE)
public class DexMojo
extends AbstractAndroidMojo
    Converts compiled Java classes to the Android dex format.
    Author:
    hugo.josefson@jayway.com
